summary: The video discusses the viral fame of Mona Patel, a mystery woman who gained attention at the Met Gala due to her stunning beauty and an impressive dress featuring mechanical moving butterflies. The video explains that despite her glamorous appearance, many people were unaware of her identity. It reveals that Mona Patel is an Indian businesswoman and philanthropist who moved to the U.S. to pursue higher education and build a successful business empire. As the CEO of the non-profit 'Couture for Cause,' she uses her influence in the fashion industry to raise funds for educational and healthcare opportunities for aspiring fashion professionals in developing countries. The video highlights her wealth, charitable work, and the reason behind her presence at the event.
keywords: Mona Patel, Met Gala, viral, stunning dress, mechanical butterflies, Indian businesswoman, philanthropist, Couture for Cause, fashion industry, charity, education, healthcare, developing countries
